backend/main.mo: Defines data types and maps for users, travellers, trips, and payments, and provides profile and app‑data save/fetch functions with access control.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping feature IDs to related frontend files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of various frontend source files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder for global frontend styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads the root React app through main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component handling authentication, profile setup gating, theming, and rendering the ledger page.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Header showing branding, sync status, and logout controls with cache and identity clearing.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Wrapper that enforces Internet Identity login before rendering app content.
frontend/src/components/EmptyState.tsx: Generic empty‑state UI component with optional icon, illustration, and action button.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for first‑time users to enter and save their name, preventing dismissal until completed.
frontend/src/components/ResponsiveTableS: Provides horizontal scroll wrapping for table content on smaller screens.
frontend/src/components/SyncStatusIndica: Displays syncing, synced, or failed status with icons and last‑sync time.
frontend/src/features/ledger/BackupResto: Provides UI to export ledger state to a JSON backup and restore it with confirmation when unsaved changes exist. Handles file import, merge restore, and status toasts.
frontend/src/features/ledger/CarExpenses: Manages car expense entry with categories, auto-toll settings, validation, and displays totals for the selected date range. Includes a dialog for adding expenses and syncing toll settings.
frontend/src/features/ledger/CashPayment: Dialog form for adding a traveller's cash payment with validation, date selection, notes, and submission callback. Resets state and shows success toasts after submitting.
frontend/src/features/ledger/ClearDataPa: Protected admin panel requiring a password to unlock various data‑clearing actions (all data, daily data, payments, pending amounts, car expenses). Each action uses confirmation dialogs and triggers state‑clearing functions with toasts.
frontend/src/features/ledger/CoTraveller: Dialog for adding or editing co‑traveller income entries with amount, date, and note fields. Handles validation, state resets, and calls ledger state actions for create/update.
frontend/src/features/ledger/DailyPartic: Renders a daily trip participation grid with bulk toggles, weekend settings, and save actions using ledger state.
frontend/src/features/ledger/DateRangePi: Provides a date‑range selector using popover calendars, supporting controlled or context-driven updates.
frontend/src/features/ledger/DeleteCarEx: Displays a confirmation dialog for deleting a car expense and triggers a toast on success.
frontend/src/features/ledger/DeleteCashP: Shows a confirmation dialog for deleting a cash payment tied to a traveller and notifies on success.
frontend/src/features/ledger/DeleteTripH: Confirmation dialog for deleting a trip history entry, with additional warning for traveller entries.
frontend/src/features/ledger/EditCarExpe: Dialog for editing a car expense with form validation and update submission.
frontend/src/features/ledger/EditCashPay: Dialog allowing edits to a cash payment’s amount, date, and note, with validation and toast feedback.
frontend/src/features/ledger/EditTripHis: Form dialog to update a traveller’s morning/evening trip participation for a specific date.
frontend/src/features/ledger/ExpenseHist: Wraps the expense history view inside a dialog for browsing expense records.
Displays, filters, sorts, and manages car expense records with edit and delete dialogs.
frontend/src/features/ledger/ExportButto: Shows an Export button that opens the export report dialog.
frontend/src/features/ledger/ExportRepor: Dialog for exporting ledger reports with format, type, and filter options, triggering PDF or CSV export.
Main ledger page managing tabs, dialogs, date ranges, and overall UI structure.
frontend/src/features/ledger/LedgerState: Provides global ledger state and actions via React context using local state hooks.
frontend/src/features/ledger/MobileLedge: Mobile sidebar navigation for switching tabs and opening history or export dialogs.
frontend/src/features/ledger/OtherPendin: Form dialog to add a new 'other pending' amount for a traveller with validation.
frontend/src/features/ledger/OverallSumm: Computes total income, expenses, profit/loss, and monthly breakdowns from ledger data and renders a summary UI.
frontend/src/features/ledger/PaymentHist: Dialog wrapper that displays the payment history view with scrollable content.
Filters, sorts, and displays cash payments with traveller filtering and edit/delete actions.
frontend/src/features/ledger/PaymentSumm: Generates per‑traveller payment/charge summaries and overall totals for the selected date range.
frontend/src/features/ledger/RatePerTrip: Provides an input control for viewing and updating the rate charged per trip.
frontend/src/features/ledger/SummaryPane: Computes per‑traveller trip counts, charges, payments, and balances and displays detailed summaries with forms for adding payments.
frontend/src/features/ledger/TravellerMa: Allows adding, renaming, and removing travellers, blocking deletion when balances are unsettled.
frontend/src/features/ledger/TripHistory: Builds and displays a sorted list of traveller and co‑traveller trip entries with totals and edit/delete dialogs. Pulls data from ledger state and prepares per‑day trip records within the selected date range.
frontend/src/features/ledger/TripsPaymen: Renders a dropdown to pick a year within a predefined range and notifies the parent of changes. Uses a calendar icon and UI select components.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity, initializing access control when authenticated. Invalidates dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAppDataSync.ts: Continuously syncs local ledger state with remote backend data, merging on changes and handling polling, debouncing, and version tracking. Provides sync status and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useAutoTollSettings.t: Manages auto‑toll settings stored in localStorage with persistent enable/amount fields. Exposes helpers to update and save the settings.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an authentication context using Internet Identity, handling login, stored identity restoration, and status tracking. Wraps AuthClient setup and exposes login and clear functions.
frontend/src/hooks/useLedgerLocalState.t: Maintains all local ledger data including travellers, trips, payments, expenses, date ranges, and settings, with load/save logic backed by localStorage. Provides helpers for generating IDs, cloning data, and merging stored state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks to fetch and save the caller’s user profile via the backend actor. Handles loading states and invalidates profile queries on save.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, plus global styles and table formatting.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider, importing global styles.
Provides functions to generate monthly, profit/loss, income, and expense statements from ledger data.
frontend/src/utils/backupRestore.ts: Implements backup export/import, validation, and merging logic for ledger state.
frontend/src/utils/dateRange.ts: Utility functions for generating date ranges, formatting dates, and filtering weekdays.
frontend/src/utils/exportExcel.ts: Builds CSV-based Excel exports including daily grids and summary calculations for travellers.
frontend/src/utils/exportPdf.ts: Generates various PDF reports based on ledger data and selected report type.
frontend/src/utils/exportReport.ts: Generates CSV and PDF carpool ledger reports based on filters, traveller data, daily participation, payments, and expenses.
frontend/src/utils/ledgerBalances.ts: Computes per-traveller trips, charges, payments, pending amounts, and final balance within a date range.
frontend/src/utils/money.ts: Provides helpers to format and parse INR currency values.
frontend/src/utils/tripCalculations.ts: Calculates total and monthly income from trip data, including co-traveller income and weekend handling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Manages URL and session-stored parameters, supporting hash-based routing and persistence.
frontend/src/utils/weekendInclusion.ts: Determines whether weekend dates should be included or editable based on settings and saved trip data.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for the project.
project_state.json: Describes project metadata, features, requirements, and current state for the Carpool Ledger app.
